item.title: SQLite3: Use Nth Value in First Record of Selected Groups
item.description: In a previous post where I used pandas to transform the following (with some amendments to the column names): id | book_id | bdate | is_borrowed 0 | abc | 2020-01-01 | True 1 | abc | 2020-02-02 | True 2 | abc | 2020-03-03 | True 3 | def | 2020-04-04 | False 4 | def | 2020-05-05 | False 5 | ghi | 2020-06-06 | True 6 | ghi | 2020-07-07 | True 7 | ghi | 2020-08-08 | True 8 | jkl | 2020-09-09 | False 9 | jkl | 2020-10-10 | False 10 | jkl | 2020-11-11 | False to:
